context: In 2020, operating as NortonLifeLock (post-split from Symantec/Broadcom in 2019), the company focused on consumer cybersecurity and identity protection. Key strategic move: acquisition of German security firm Avira in December 2020 for $360 million, expanding its consumer antivirus portfolio. The consumer cybersecurity market was highly competitive with traditional antivirus vendors and emerging identity protection services.
